metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8601 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
PowerDNS Recursor before 3.6.2 does not limit delegation chaining, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service ("performance degradations") via a large or infinite number of referrals, as demonstrated by resolving domains hosted by ezdns.it.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8601` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pdns-recursor - 3.5.3-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.3-1ubuntu0.1').
